Definition: Space temperature setpoint when in heating mode.
Space temperature setpoint when in cooling mode.
Space setpoint or upper limit for relative humidity when in cooling mode.
Required air change rate for the space. Used to calculate required cooling/heating flowrates. Note - not outdoor air specific.
Method for calculating required outdoor air flowrate to space. Options: Code Minimum, Percent Above Code Min, CFM Per Person, ACH Rate

Applies to the selected Ventilation Rate Type. For Percent Above Code Min: Enter % extra outdoor air above code min. For ACH Rate: Enter required ACH Rate. No entry required for the other calculation types.
Mechanical code occupancy type, defines the CFM Per Person and CFM / SF values used to calculate the code minimum ventilation rate.
Pulled from mechanical code per the selected Code Occupancy Classification. Can be overriden.
Pulled from mechanical code per the selected Code Occupancy Classification. Can be overriden.
Used to calculate number of occupants in each space.
ASHRAE defined amount of activity in the space. Used to define the sensible and latent BTUH gains per occupant.
Pulled from ASHRAE per selected Degree of Activity. Can be overriden.
Pulled from ASHRAE per selected Degree of Activity. Can be overriden.
